name: Core (Trip Type)
description:
Use your three shapes to shoot as many enemies as you can and reach the maximum score !

Core is a solo shoot'em up with an innovative gameplay consisting in switching between three different shapes to protect you and destroy enemies :

  • The one sided : a big shield providing huge protection and a devastating laser
  • The two-sided : a multidirectional shield with lateral shoot
  • The four-sided : small shield but big spread

Choose the best one to score through the levels but be careful, your core is your weak point.
